name: Rise of Jericho
description:
Lead a tribe of hunter-gatherers to build Jericho, one of the oldest cities in human history.


  • Gather resources
  • Craft and equip tools
  • Build houses, a tavern a temple and more
  • Protect the city from invasions
  • Unlock inventions

The Dawn of Human Civilization


Humans have a unique capacity of coming together to collaborate, protect each other and build wonderful structures. Watch over your city and lead villagers to give rise to human civilization.

Collect and manage your resources wisely:
  • Food: Find different sources of food to make sure that all villagers can eat.
  • Mud Bricks: Everyone can make mud bricks from the ground, and it can hold the strongest structures together.
  • Stone: Mine stones and craft tools to advance your civilization to the next level.



Progress throughout human history and unlock different inventions to boost your civilization:
  • Agriculture: grow food constantly so nobody goes hungry.
  • Clothing: cover your villagers with better robes to protect them.
  • Crafting: craft beer to share with your villagers as the hard working days go by.
  • And much more!

The Oldest City in the World


More than 10,000 years ago, even before the use of agriculture, humans gathered by the Jordan River, giving rise to Jericho, one of the oldest cities in the world, settled. With a history full of invasions and attacks by many different civilizations. From cavemen to bandits and biblical characters, each left their mark on the culture, architecture, and history of Jericho and the whole of humankind.
